article_title: Indian Prime Minister Sets Out Stall for German Industry at Messe Trade Fair
article_text:
HANNOVER—Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi sought to convince German industry that India is a reliable place to do business on his first visit to Europe’s largest economy as India’s leader.

“I am here to assure German companies that India is now a changed country — transparent, responsive and stable,” Mr. Modi told a delegation of Indian and...
